answers.answer: "Drink more water?"  You need to be SEEN by a physician to rule out WHY you have this swelling; this is NOT a good thing at all.  There is NO over the counter pill to take for this.  Repeat: you need to be seen by a physician asap!!!!  Sounds like something vascular is going on.If it gets worst, I would recommend seeking emergent care.
